message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $105.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
